title: Cannot Install LoL
body: Everytime I download the installer and click the application, the icon pops up and it freezes there and crashes. I've tried changing the compatibility and all it does is stop the icon from crashing but it still does nothing. I've tried contacting support about this issue but haven't got a response for a while.

replies.body: You might be having a problem with your OS's permissions not letting LoL launch correctly. Run through this [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to double check those settings, but let me know if you still can't get in.
